channel.title: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?
channel.description: I want to know how to write my own 317 framework. Anyone have a TUT on it? I searched on google but couldn't find what I was looking for.

item.title: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.source: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?

item.title: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I would write from scratch, not copy and pasting, using the download as a reference. This way you see what’s going in and possibly learn more.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?

item.title: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Download a framework, and learn what it consists of.

I recommend Varek’s Rs2d, as it’s a really clean / simple base.[/quote]
Okay thanks. After I do all that how would I go about really start making something?

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have a TUT on writing your own framework?
